DOC.brief_summary: Comparison adjuvanted hepatitis B vaccine double dose Engerix™-B pre- /haemodialysis patient age ≥15 year
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Adjuvanted Hepatitis B Vaccine Double Dose Engerix™-B Pre- /Haemodialysis Patients Aged ≥15 Years
DOC.criteria: A male female > = 15 year age time first vaccination . Written inform consent obtain subject/ parent guardian subject . Seronegative antiHBs antibody , antiHBc antibody & Hepatitis B Surface antigen ( HBsAg ) . If subject female , nonchildbearing potential , childbearing potential , abstinent use adequate contraceptive precaution one month prior enrollment two month last vaccination . Prehaemodialysis patient* patient haemodialysis . Use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine study vaccine study period within 30 day precede first dose study vaccine . Previous vaccination hepatitis B . History hepatitis B infection . Known exposure hepatitis B virus within 6 week . Pregnant lactate female Clinically abnormal ALT/AST value ( > 3 time normal value )
